title: What is your top requirement when entering in a romantic relationship? - Quora

response.answer_text: That he be my twin flame. With women, especially black women, there has to be a since of teamwork, and loyalty. I am not here to fund the free life you think you're owed. Any woman that wants to be involved me is being evaluated as a partner. There will be always be hard times, and arguments, but I expect loyalty, and respect. I don't care how pretty she is or how high her Sexual Marketplace Value is. Loyalty, respect, and trust are highly important in the building of relationships.
